issue.title: Add a link to edit Joomla user from and easySDI user
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

To ease users management I propose to add a link to edit Joomla user from and easySDI user.
Next to the user field.
!EditJoomlaUser.png!


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Note: the link has to updated in JS if user is changed.

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC OK.
